# CI/CD Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show the status of your CI/CD pipeline:

## Workflow Status Badges

```markdown
![CI](https://github.com/johnheliang/johnndekebitikportfolio/workflows/CI/badge.svg)
![Deploy Production](https://github.com/johnheliang/johnndekebitikportfolio/workflows/Deploy%20to%20Production/badge.svg)
![Preview Deployment](https://github.com/johnheliang/johnndekebitikportfolio/workflows/Preview%20Deployment/badge.svg)
```

## Code Quality Badges

```markdown

```

## Full Example for README

```markdown
# John Portfolio

![CI](https://github.com/johnheliang/johnndekebitikportfolio/workflows/CI/badge.svg)
![Deploy Production](https://github.com/johnheliang/johnndekebitikportfolio/workflows/Deploy%20to%20Production/badge.svg)
![Vercel](https://vercelbadge.vercel.app/api/johnheliang/johnndekebitikportfolio)
![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)

## Status

- **Build**: Automated CI/CD with GitHub Actions
- **Deployment**: Vercel (Production & Preview)
- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- **Testing**: Jest, React Testing Library
```
